name: Pestibot Game
description:
Check out my alpha version of game pillar ash. It’s in development and not finished but you can still check out and try it and test it out.

Collect the coins like quarters, nickels and pennies

Shoot the Robots

Quarter is worth is 25 points

Nickel is worth 5 points

Pennies are worth 1 point

Collect life potions like purple liquid and energy bar.

Purple points worth 30 life points

Energy bars are worth 60 life points

Just a heads up robots don't move and mountain and rocks are gone for now

Also spider may get stuck to a corner nd flies don't move

Otherwise the game works great and still playable
